meaningMnemonic: At this <radical>gate</radical> you're trying to get some <radical>beans</radical> through, but the <radical>measurements</radical> were off and you're starting to <kanji>struggle</kanji>. No matter how you push or pull these beans, they're just too big to get through the gate.
readingMnemonic: You continue to <kanji>struggle</kanji> because you need to get these beans to the other side of the gate and into <reading>とう</reading>きょう. You usually struggle a little when people want to bring things through the gate to とうきょう, but this is ridiculous.
